wheedle.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to persuade someone to do or give you something, for example by saying nice things to them that you do not mean – used to show disapproval
wheedle.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She even managed to wheedle more money out of him.
You have to be able to wheedle your client into buying.
Don’t think you can just wheedle your way in here!
wheedle your way in/into/out of etc
